richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Blankets for T.O. successfully hosted a meet and greet at the University of Toronto Scarborough for students to introduce our organization to the community. First of all, thank you to all those students that were able to take the time to come! It was amazing to see and meet all of you. The agenda of the session was to inform students about how they could contribute to Blankets for T.O., including how they could become a member, apply for executive positions, donate to the cause, and become a volunteer at future events.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4HWB4QEmsa3h8WhPTXDwis","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"It also wouldn't be a Blankets for T.O. meeting if we did not show off our blankets!
